description.narrative: Insatsens övergripande mål är att "strenghten the role and participation of Cambodian Forest Dependent Communities in improved governance, inclusive policy dialogue and natural resources conservation". Insatsens specifika mål är att "ensure the active contribution of members of forest dependent communities, organized in CPAs, to national policy dialogue and to the implementation of reforms and legal actions related to the access, sustainable use and management of forest resources". Insatsen förväntas uppnå följande resultat: 1. "By 2020, 18 CPAs' organizational and management capacities are improved with greater engagement of women to fulfill decision making roles in CPA management committees". 2. "By 2020, CPAs members and representatives gain capacities and skills to contribute to policy dialogue and to implement local actions for the protection and conservation of forests". 3. "By 2022, CPAs are engaged in national policy dialogue and actions for the protection and conservation of forests with law makers, relevant authorities and private sector".

WWF Sverige har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 7 783 006 SEK för EU-projektet "ACCESS - Advancing CSOs' Capacity to Enhance Sustainability Solutions" för perioden 2018-2022.
Insatsen syftar till att:
1. "Strenghten the role and participation of Cambodian Forest Dependent Communities in improved governance, inclusive policy dialogue and natural resources conservation".
2. "Ensure the active contribution of members of forest dependent communities, organized in CPAs, to national policy dialogue and to the implementation of reforms and legal actions related to the access, sustainable use and management of forest resources".
WWF Sverige kommer att arbeta i samverkan med fyra organisationer: WWF Kambodja, Oxfam Kambodja, My Village Inc och Community Legal Education Center. WWF Sverige är huvudsökande organisation och WWF Kambodja har det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer EuropeAid/153949/DD/ACT/KH. Insatsen har en total budget på 2 830 185 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 28 986 472 SEK. Av detta har WWF Sverige beviljats 2 122 639 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 7 783 006 SEK (cirka 25 %) från Sida.

WWF Sweden has applied to Sida for funding of 7 783 006 SEK to carry out the EU-Project "ACCESS - Advancing CSOs' Capacity to Enhance Sustainability Solutions" during the period 2018-2022.
The project aims to:
1. Strenghten the role and participation of Cambodian Forest Dependent Communities in improved governance, inclusive policy dialogue and natural resources conservation.
2. Ensure the active contribution of members of forest dependent communities, organized in CPAs, to national policy dialogue and to the implementation of reforms and legal actions related to the access, sustainable use and management of forest resources.
WWF Sweden will collaborate with four civil society organizations: WWF Cambodia, Oxfam Cambodia, My Village Inc and Community Legal Education Center. WWF Sweden is lead applicant to Sida and WWF Cambodia has the overall responsibility for the coordination and implementation of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number: EuropeAid/153949/DD/ACT/KH. The contribution's total budget is 2 830 185 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 28 986 472 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 7 783 006 SEK, which corresponds to 25 % of the total budget.

participating-org.narrative: WWF/World Wide Fund for Nature, Sweden
WWF/World Wide Fund for Nature, Sweden

tag.narrative: 15.2 - By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally.

15.2 - Till 2020 främja genomförandet av hållbart brukande av alla typer av skogar, stoppa avskogningen, återställa utarmade skogar och kraftigt öka nybeskogningen och återbeskogningen i hela världen.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
